snippet: The Industrial Trust building, which once announced Rhode Island’s capital as a Gotham of industry, now nags at the city’s sense of self-worth.
abstract: Dan Barry this Land column; Industrial Trust building, storied Providence, RI, skyscraper that was once a symbol of industrial growth, now sits empty after years of slipping into economic irrelevance and changing ownership; current owner High Rock Development wants to carve building into rental apartments, but taxpayers are balking at tens of millions of dollars in tax breaks it is seeking to do so.
lead_paragraph: The Industrial Trust building, which once announced Rhode Island’s capital as a Gotham of industry, now nags at the city’s sense of self-worth.

headline.main: Storied Providence Skyscraper, Now Empty, Seeks a Future
headline.print_headline: Storied Providence Skyscraper, Now Empty, Seeks a Future
